title: Touch Of My Hand
body:
Another day without a lover the more I come to understand the touch of my hand.

Touch Of My Hand

I’m not ashamed of the things that I dreamI find myself flirting with the verge of obsceneInto the unknown, I will be boldI’m going to places I can be out of control“Loki?” You whisper softly,…

Read more…

summary:
So I’ve been thinking about Spider-Man/Peter’s death in Infinity War recently. 
The scene was heartbreaking, and I apologise for...
body:
Parallels

So I’ve been thinking about Spider-Man/Peter’s death in Infinity War recently.

The scene was heartbreaking, and I apologise for any painful wounds that I reopen by bringing it up.

The first time I saw this scene in the theatre, it immediately reminded me of a very similar death scene in the Fox procedural drama Bones.

In the episode The Hole in the Heart, recurring character Vincent Nigel-Murray is shot in the heart by a sniper, and slowly dies.

The scene has some similarities.

Both characters linger for a time after the fatal wound is struck. Both know that they’re dying. Both fight it. Both repeatedly state that they don’t want to go.

Both scenes were heartbreaking.

At first I didn’t think much of it. I assumed that it was simply a coincidence or my imagination. Then I remembered something.

This is John Francis Daley:

John Francis Daley was a cast regular on Bones, as Dr. Lance Sweets, for several Seasons, including both of the seasons in which Vincent Nigel-Murray was a recurring character:

John Francis Daley was part of the writing team for Spider-Man: Homecoming:

Coincidence?! I think not!!

summary: Tom Hardy Avengers’a Mı Dahil Oluyor?
title: Tom Hardy Avengers’a Mı Dahil Oluyor?
body:
Venom‘un vizyona girmesine az bir zaman kala oldukça ilginç bir bilgi ortaya çıktı.

Başrolünde Tom Hardy ’nin yer aldığı Venom‘un vizyona girmesine az bir zaman kaldı. Bu süreçte yapılan röportajlar sayesinde enteresan bilgiler ortaya çıkıyor. Bunlardan biri de Tom Hardy’nin Avengers’a olan takıntısı.

Bildiğiniz gibi Venom, Marvel Sinematik Evreni‘nden bağımsız bir hikaye olacak. Bunun sağlanabilmesi için senaryonun Spider-Man ile hiçbir şekilde bağlantı kurmaması gerekiyor ki öyle de olacak zaten. Maalesef Venom’un bulunduğu filmde Spider-Man’e dair herhangi bir bulgu göremeyeceğiz.

Paylaşılan tanıtımlar da Spider-Man’siz bir orijin hikayesi seyredeceğimize işaret ediyor. Buna rağmen hayranların büyük bir kısmı ufak bir sahneyle de olsa Tom Holland‘ı filmde görmeyi arzu ediyor.

Tom Hardy Avengers’a katılmak istiyor!

Bu sayede onun Avengers’ın koca dünyasına katılabilmesi için bir kapı açılmış olacak. Görünen o ki Tom Hardy de bu fikre sıcak bakıyor. Onun bu konudaki yorumları MTV‘nin gerçekleştirdiği röportajla ortaya çıktı.

Bildiğiniz gibi Venom yetişkinlere hitap eden vahşet, kan ve cinsellik sahnelerine yer vermeyecek. Aksine daha genel bir kitleye hitap etmeyi tercih edecek. Tom Hardy bu durumdan bahsederken tercihin Avengers ile bağlantı kurmaya kapı açtığına da değindi.

Kendisinin Marvel dünyasına dahil olmaktan şikayetçi olmayacağını, gerekli anlaşmalar sağlandıktan sonra bu bağlantıyı kurmak için doğru insanlara sahip olduklarını belirtti.

The post Tom Hardy Avengers’a Mı Dahil Oluyor? appeared first on istandist.com - İstanbul’ u Keşfet & Explore the Istanbul.



from WordPress https://istandist.com/tom-hardy-avengersa-mi-dahil-oluyor/

blog.name: ao3feed-clintxnat
blog.title: love is for children, i owe him a debt.
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of all fic posted on the Archive Of Our Own under the Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov pairing tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed using an IFTTT recipe, but this was made easy thanks to astolat (astolat.tumblr.com). If you would like to set up a similar blog, see the instructions tab :) To check announcements regarding these blogs, go to the tumblr tag #ao3feed announcement. (moderated by enjolbutt.tumblr.com) I hope this blog helps when you are in dire need of feels or a laugh, so enjoy! :)

title: Kill Count
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2xX1PFQ

by RampageOneShots

An AU where Clint Barton never joined SHEILD and instead became Ronin the Masterless Assassin.

During a mission, the Avengers are captured and detained by Hyrdra where they meet the 17-year-old Clint Barton, with no idea where they try to communicate with the teen in the cell next to them.

WARNING: BLOOD AND GORE/TORTURE

Words: 1436, Chapters: ½, Language: English

  • Fandoms: The Avengers (Marvel) - All Media Types
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Characters: Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Tony Stark, Steve Rogers, Bruce Banner, Thor (Marvel), Clint Barton, Hydra Agents, Avengers Team (MCU), Nick Fury
  • Relationships: Clint Barton/Natasha Romanov, Clint Barton & Natasha Romanov, Clint Barton/Tony Stark, Clint Barton & Tony Stark, Clint Barton/Steve Rogers, Clint Barton & Steve Rogers, Bruce Banner/Clint Barton, Bruce Banner & Clint Barton, Clint Barton/Thor, Clint Barton & Thor, Clint Barton/Hydra Agents, Clint Barton & Hydra Agents
  • Additional Tags: Assassin Clint Barton, Deaf Clint Barton, Blood, Gore, Blood and Gore, Torture, Clint Barton is Ronin

tags: insomnia comes up with great ideas
body:
So…

Has Marvel already got Céline Dion a song lined up for Avengers 4? Cause after the shit they’ve put us through I feel we need a good power ballad so they can officially kill us. Make her cameo in the movie and have her and Peter fangirl over each other for a minute.

summary: I would be correcting the mistakes in those medical series all the time. The fourth wall would break so hard. I would pause the...
body:
I would be correcting the mistakes in those medical series all the time.

The fourth wall would break so hard. I would pause the episode and be like, “GUYS, IT’S NOT LIKE THIS IN REAL LIFE”.
